overview:
Networkers Guru is the pioneer in offshore IT training and certification institute in gurgaon, We proudly announces our training institute in Jaipur, through this location we covers almost north india along with Delhi NCR.

Offshore training costs 50% of the prices prevalent in USA and Europe (including cost of ptravel, hotel p& meals). Microsoft training: MCSE, MCITP, Windows Registry Cisco training: CCNA, CCNP, CCVP, CCIP, CCSP, And CCIE Unix / Linux training: RHCE, Solaris Security training: Security+, CEH, CHFI, Checkpoint Specialized training: CISSP, CISA, CISM, CBCP, CSSLP

Great Instructors :

With Networkers Guru’s award winning HR practices, Networkers Guru is able to hire and retain the best instructors in the industry. All instructors are certified and possess excellent communication skills in English. Personalized (1-on-1) Training:

With 1-on-1 training you get the undivided attention of the trainer. You can start training from Any Date. The course can be custom-made to your requirement. Three tracks to choose from (Regular, Fast, Super Fast) :

Super Fast Track is for experienced IT professionals, Regular Track is for beginners. Fast Track for those who fall in-between.
